item.title: Data Stragety - 201
item.description: Metrics - Short Short Course These questions should be applied to all metrics in my opinion; metrics for various subsystem’s performance, business metrics, product metrics, etc. Always ask yourself the following: What am I trying to measure and how can I describe & communicate it? What does it mean from the perspectives of others e.g. the user’s view, your data, web, and business team’s view, etc.? Can I measure it accurately?
